title: We
Boost
Digital
Ideas
top.subtitle: With the power of our product teams, experience in workculture and network we take your digital business idea to the next level.

offering.title: Get the Twip Boost
offering.subtitle:
Move faster from idea to product.
Together we create the perfect setup for your growth.

startup.title: Great Idea, but a Lack of Tech Experience?
startup.text: Twip assists you in forming the right product team and developing your first MVP in the shortest possible time - a solid basis to convince first customers and investors. We offer you the opportunity to share the risk by co-investing in you and your product.

corporate.title: Want to speed up your Digital Innovation?
corporate.text: With hundreds of available digital experts in strategy, design and development we are your partner to accelerate your digital venture building. Our venture-as-a-service approach ensures working hand-in-hand with your idea owners on a shared vision.

valueProp.title: Kick Start Your Venture!
valueProp.subtitle: There are two things we are very good at: Building software and creating workplaces people enjoy working at - We love to share that!

product.title: Product & Tech
product.text: We provide fully functional teams out of a pool of over 900 digital experts and tech lead candidates to complete your founders team temporarily. We are experienced in developing and designing business critical and scalable software. Our passion: identify, validate and implement the most promising features for your customers. Our goal: to make you and your venture self-sufficient and independent from Twip.

team.title: Team & Culture
team.text: Talents with digital DNA appreciate freedom and trust. The basis for this is a workplace culture that we are building together with you in the spirit of a Great Place to Work. Our strong recruiting teams support you in attracting new talent. You benefit from know-how from hundreds of agile projects as well as a self-developed learning and training approach - implemented by people who apply what they teach every day.

impact.title: Tech for Positive Impact
impact.text: With our engagement, we want to influence society and the environment in a positiv and purposeful way: An intact ecological, social and economic structure should be preserved. If you share this vision as a founder, join us on our journey!

team.title: The Faces behind Twip
team.subtitle: Our core team has experience in the areas of entrepreneurship, software development and digital design. Feel free connecting to us!

partners.title: Network & Partners
partners.subtitle: It is important to us to provide the necessary support at any point in time. Our network complements our team with the appropriate skills.

experience.title: Powered by more than 900 Digital Experts
experience.subtitle: Twip Venture Studio is a joint effort of MaibornWolff and QAware. You benefit from their project experience with numerous corporate and startup customers.

qaware.text: Shaping the digital future with high quality software engineering

maibornwolff.text: Consulting, Coding and Testing in critical digitalisation projects.

contact.title: Get in touch
text: We're happy to get to know you!
